name: Visma eAccounting Print Voucher (Verifikat)
description:
A style for printing a SELECTED voucher in Visma eAccounting.
En stilmall f√∂r att skriva ut ett VALT verifikat i Visma eEkonomi.
additional_info:
2016-06-12: Removed a padding on the class .list-container
2016-10-02: Created a totally new stylesheet which supports the new styling of the eAccounting application which was released a few weeks ago.
2016-11-04: Removed a list-container-row (header?) which should be hidden
2016-11-04: Removed a box-shadow on the voucher-div
2016-11-04: Increased the width of the voucherType and voucherDate columns
2016-11-04: Had to set a standard font-family (Arial) to make the printing work better (some characters were'nt always printed with the Google 'Open Sans' font.
